homePageContent.brandsIntroduction:
A Collective of the Finest Luxury Kitchen &
Furniture Brands From Germany

At Innerspace, we believe in orchestrating only the finest homes. We partner with some of the finest brands in the world, delivering rigorously tested, time-withstanding furniture, appliances and storage solutions. With intelligent functionality at its core, our partners elevate living spaces. Explore brands by Innerspace.
homePageContent.designByRoomIntroduction:
Design by Room

Luxuriously limitless living spaces

Reimagine the possibilities of structure at our world-class showroom, the ultimate confluence of distinguished design and unsurpassed expertise. Innerspace brings you the goodness of fine natural materials to transform the ordinary. Reimagine your living spaces with our expert designers.

designByRoomSlider.shortDescription: Kitchens are the centres of living spaces. Imagine a kitchen that keeps your essentials at hand, and the extras out of sight. Innerspace brings you kitchens with ergonomics engineered so efficiently; cooking becomes an effortless choreography. Explore kitchens built by expert craftsmen and with only the finest materials. Explore the possibilities of a kitchen built for you.
designByRoomSlider.title: Kitchens that revolutionise cooking

designByRoomSlider.shortDescription: A space for entertaining that marries opulent comfort and exquisite design. Create spaces that reflect you in a seamless coalescence of contemporary design and the finest natural materials.  Experience harmonies of opulent colours and elegant neutrals, through furniture that elevate function and lighting designed to create arresting focal points. Come reimagine your living space.
designByRoomSlider.title: Living Rooms that elevate gatherings

designByRoomSlider.shortDescription: Your bedroom is your sanctuary. A room that makes space for rest, productivity, and transformation. A room that makes space for you. Our intelligent use of space elevates your bedroom to aid restorative sleep and equips it with revolutionary functionality. Experience a room that looks and feels exactly the way you want. Experience a sanctuary built for you.
designByRoomSlider.title: Bedrooms that double up as sanctuaries
